connectionError.message: It is not possible to retrieve requested information. Try again to perform the request!
connectionError.title: Check Connection

servicesCategoryNotSelected.message: It is not selected any service to research.
servicesCategoryNotSelected.title: Services Not Selected

timeoutError.message: It is not possible to retrieve requested information. Try again to perform the request.
timeoutError.title: Check Connection

servicesServerError.message: It is not possible to retrieve requested information. Try again to perform the request.
servicesServerError.title: Unavailable Information

noFullTextResults.message: The research found no services. Try a different research.
noFullTextResults.title: Service Not Found

noTextToSearch.message: It is not entered any text to research.
noTextToSearch.title: No Text

positionWarning.message: It is not possible to find current position. Location lookup seems active, check if you are connected to the Internet to find the location through the network. Finally, try to restart the app.
positionWarning.title: Position Not Found

manualPosition.message: Tap anywhere on the map to search at a particular point.
manualPosition.title: Manual Position

overMaxDistance.message: It is not possible to search on an area larger than the one displayed.
overMaxDistance.title: Maximum Distance Reached

chooseGpsManualSearchCenter.message: Where do you want to search?

chooseGpsServiceSearchCenter.message: Where do you want to search?

chooseManualServiceSearchCenter.message: Where do you want to search?

addCalendarSuccess.message: The event has been added to calendar.
addCalendarSuccess.title: Inserted

addCalendarError.message: It was not possible to add the event in the calendar.
addCalendarError.title: Not Inserted

saveSurveyResultError.message: It was not possible to send the results of the survey
saveSurveyResultError.title: Not Sent

navigatorSearcherStart.message: Pressing "Start" switches to navigation. The position will move automatically and will perform a search of the selected services in the menu, in the area indicated in the settings.
navigatorSearcherStart.title: Navigation Mode

photoUpload.moderator: They will be visible after approval.

sendStarsDone.message: The vote for this service is stored correctly.
sendStarsDone.title: Vote Inserted

sendStarsError.message: Try again to vote the service because the vote was not stored.
sendStarsError.title: Vote Not Inserted

sendCommentDone.message: The comment for this service is stored correctly. It will be visible after approval.
sendCommentDone.title: Comment Inserted

sendCommentError.message: Try again to comment the service because the comment was not stored.
sendCommentError.title: Comment Not Inserted

webPositionDenied.message: Please enable the geolocalizion permissions in settings of your browser.
webPositionDenied.title: Position Denied

notSupported3D.message: This device does not support the 3D mode of the map.
notSupported3D.title: 3D Mode Not Supported

unauthorized.message: You are not registered or have entered wrong emails and / or passwords

updateApp.message: You must update your app to access your profile

emailNotSpecifiedFB.message: You can not register if you do not authorize mail information
